name: Anthony TRUSCELLO & Carol Truscello, H/W, Appellees, v. MEDICAL PROFESSIONAL LIABILITY CATASTROPHE LOSS FUND, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 12th day of February, 1999, the Order of the Commonwealth Court dated August 5, 1997 is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

724 A.2d 346
